name: Unique Character Ability: Block Wizard
description:
This character with a unique character ability is designed for the first round of the GDKO jam. (https://itch.io/jam/gdko-round-1) It features a wizard with the power to place (a limited amount) of stone platforms to climb on.

Use E to place blocks, WASD or Arrow keys to move, R to restart.

The enemy character didn't end up working in time, but I left it so players can experiment with it I guess.

Enjoy!
